text: | What is a Web Application? DUBLIN » A web application is software that runs in your web browser. » Businesses use web applications to connect with customers conveniently and securely. » The most common website features like shopping carts, product search and filtering, instant messaging, and social media newsfeeds are web applications in their design. » They allow you to access complex functionality without installing or configuring software. » Web applications involve multiple components, like an application server, database servers, CDNs, caches, and micro services.
